summary: Iteration 43 - Tino AI ElevenLabs-Inspired UI Testing. Tested the new Tino AI interface with central glowing orb, voice-first design, quick action cards, and right sidebar. All backend APIs working correctly (15/15 tests passed). Frontend UI verified with all key components present and functional.

Quick action cards send queries to Tino AI correctly

Suggestions appear in Tino responses and are clickable
